article_title: Bernanke Defends Government’s AIG Rescue in Court
article_text:
WASHINGTON—Ben S. Bernanke was making history, but the former Federal Reserve chairman seemed none too pleased about it.

Mr. Bernanke, at times visibly annoyed, took the witness stand in federal court on Thursday to defend the U.S. government’s 2008 rescue of American International Group Inc. against a lawsuit filed by Maurice R. “Hank” Greenberg, the insurance giant’s former chief executive. He testified for about three hours, often...
